name: Battle for Relics
description:
Play as one of two rival relic hunters in this fantasy style platformer as they race through deadly hazards and terrain to be the first to reach the golden chalice and be the best relic hunter. Be careful to not give your opponent a advantage by hitting a hazard and dyeing  but don’t worry because if your opponent hits a hazard too both players with be respawned and the race will be back on.

Features

Simply and easy to learn controls

3 different levels

1 action packed song

And multiple hazards spike though out the levels

Release date - 4/11/2020

Platform - Windows PC

Price - Free to play

Music by Alex Smith: cynicmusic.com pixelsphere.org
